title: how many questions per week go unanswered on myreporter.com?
text:
About
two-thirds of questions asked have already been answered in one form
or another. I reply directly to the person who asked the question,
usually with a link to the previous answer or story. Sometimes the
questions don't meet our criteria, and I let the user know that. The
remaining questions are assigned to reporters or correspondents.
Thanks for asking.
